medical_history.chief_complaint: Retroperitoneal mass and a history of transient hematuria.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 1 month prior with a small degree of hematuria noted after hiking, without pain, lasting for 2 days.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Excessive bleeding after tonsillectomy and adenoidectomy in youth; otherwise excellent health.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had multiple sclerosis; brother had insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus; paternal grandfather died of heart disease; father and other siblings and grandparents were healthy.
medical_history.social_history: Not smoking tobacco, drinking alcohol, or using illicit drugs; not sexually active; lives in an urban area and is a student.
